title: Day 316 (Matthew 27, Mark 15) - Year 3

description:
SHOW NOTES: 

- All the info you need to START is on our website! Seriously, go there. - Join our PATREON community for bonus perks!

FROM TODAY’S PODCAST: 

- Luke 20:20-26

- Leviticus 16:6-10

- John 19:11

- Revelation 13:8

- 2 Corinthians 7 :10

- Join Patreon for “Soul Rest” Bonus Content
